programme.desc: School Bus Blaze! - BEEP BEEP! It's time for school in Axle City! But, when the students need help getting to school, it's up to Blaze to save the day by becoming... SCHOOL BUS BLAZE!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S8 Ep801
programme.desc: The Pirate Grand Prix - It'sPegwheel the pirate'sfirst race-and who better to join him than Pirate Blaze!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bat / Pups Save a Toof - A baby Bat decides to take a nap hanging from the Town Halls bell and Mayor Goodway cant ring it.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Pups Save the Camping Trip / Pups and the Trouble with Turtles - Skye and Rocky go on their first camping trip, but when Chickaletta gets caught in a crevice, they have to call in the PAW Patrol.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep209
programme.desc: Call Me Billiam / The Finship Trap - When Rayna asks William to be more responsible, he sets out to become a grownup fishy named Billiam.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Paper Landscapes / Cowgirl - Barbamama and Barbapapa are surprised to see more and more billboards on the road. // Barbalala dreams of becoming a cowgirl and Barbidou is determined to help her.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep318
programme.desc: Paddington's Favourite Hero / Paddington And The Skateboarder - Paddington struggles to choose a hero for a special photo wall in the park - maybe he needs to look closer to home.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep202
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Train Station / The Crew Builds A Sierra Sparkle Sign - Rubble & Crew build the first train station in Builder Cove just in time to welcome Farmer Zoe's new cow Mooreen.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Crabby Boots / Papi's Picnic Party - Dora and Boots meet Shelly, a hermit crab missing her shell, who uses one of Boots' boots. Dora travels across the beach in search of her old shell.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Truckball Team-Up - Blaze discovers an exciting new sport called Truckball. But when Crusher and his team of cronies challenge him, Blaze must scour all of Axle City to put together a Truckball team before the big game.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Fruit Chews / Opera Cake - Henrys in a Snail Race! But Chef's fruit chews for Henry's mid-race snack are taking too long to set!

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Sharkdoghouse - Max needs to create a permanent home for Sharkdog and he knows that his best friends, Olivia and Royce, are just the people to help him.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Sharkdog Digs In - Dad desperately wants to win Garden of the Year but when Sharkdog destroys the garden right before judging, the Sharkpack needs to step in and put it all in order.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep106
programme.desc: The Great Shark Hunter - Max needs to find more and more fishsticks to keep Sharkdog fed, but his search leads him right into the path of the increasingly suspicious Captain Barb Quigley.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep222
programme.desc: Findependence Day / Costello Quits - Fishy Force takes on a villain who steals all the treats in Carnivore Cove. // When Costello quits, Vigo sets out to be a supervillain without his henchfishy.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep218
programme.desc: Finception - When Hank accidentally takes an important treasure from Swimmy Hall, he goes on a sneaky mission to set things right.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1107
programme.desc: Pups Save the Mountain Surfers / Pups Save Humdinger's Home Away From Home - Zuma and Hurricane Harrigan are about to go kitesurfing when a mighty wind sweeps them off the beach. // Mayor Humdinger takes his trailer and his kitties out for a sunny, desert vacation.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep705
programme.desc: Pups Save a Waiter-Bot - Mr. Porter's high tech waiter robot helps around the caf, but it can't stop cleaning! It's up to the Pups to clean up the mess all over town!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep215
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Indoor Skydiving Center / The Crew Builds A Roller Rink - Mayor Greatway and Mr. Ducky-Doo want to show their skydiving skills. But when wind gets in the way, the pups help them sky dive on the ground!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep213
programme.desc: The Time Capsule - Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep220
programme.desc: George's Birthday - Today is Georges birthday and Mummy and Daddy Pig have a special day planned. George gets a new Brontosaurus toy and the family go to the museum to see lots of different dinosaurs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep221
programme.desc: Tiny Creatures - Peppa and George are playing in Grandpa Pig's garden when they find a little snail. Then Grandpa also shows them his beehive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep222
programme.desc: The Sports Day - It is Sports Day at Peppas playgroup. There are lots of exciting events, including running, jumping and the tug of war. Daddy Pig tells Peppa that its not the winning that matters.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep124
programme.desc: A Present for Ron - Christopher loves Ron's rock collection so much, he wants to add another beautiful rock to it! They set off on a journey to find the most amazing rock they can find.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep125
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon - Christopher dreams to visit the moon so his friends make his wish come true. Bubu makes a rocket ship in cardboard and the friends make Christopher an outfit with everything he will need during the trip.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Ants on a Log / Quesadillas - Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Donuts - Chef attempts to bake Olly's favorite donuts for her surprise birthday breakfast without waking her up.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep716
programme.desc: Wild West Heroes - Yeehaw! Blaze, AJ, and Starla are on their way to a Wild West Picnic! But when the Lunchbox Bandit steals everyone's lunchboxes, it's up to our Wild West Heroes to get them back!

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Crowns & Castles / The Great Mondini - The hamsters overhear Dad role-playing as a dastardly knight and believe he has turned evil. // Mondo must choose between superhero life and saving his best friend at Harry's magic show.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep8
programme.desc: The Monster Badge - The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Map Readers - Glitch races the Go Jetters across the Academy to find the lost G.O. Dome of the Ancients.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep30
programme.desc: The Boreal Forest, Canada - Glitch travels to Ontario to find a new teddy bear, but things start to go very wrong...

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep24
programme.desc: Faceytalk - Bluey and Bingo love to video chat with Muffin and Socks so they can all draw pictures together. When Muffin won't give Socks a turn, the kids discover what happens when you hog.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep25
programme.desc: Ragdoll - Dad agrees to take Bluey and Bingo to the shops to buy an ice-cream if they can get him into the car. Only problem is... he's just entered 'Ragdoll' mode!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Bedroom - Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep96
programme.desc: Take Off - Po collects lots of balloons and takes off into the air! Floating high above Teletubbyland, Po waves at Tinky Winky, Dipsy and LaaLaa below. When the balloons pop, Po lands.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Let's Do The Tubby - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing and "Do the Tubby!".

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep25
programme.desc: The First Big Camping Adventure - The friends are excited to go on a camping trip, but Zip is nervous about being in a dark place away from home. He must try to overcome his fears.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Dog Loves Warm - The bookshop is cold so Dog and Pug go to the Antarctic to find out how animals keep warm.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Spidermessy - Messy goes to OKIDO and helps his friends mend Loopy Bridge, but Zim finds himself in a sticky situation along the way!

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep37
programme.desc: Dizzy - Messy and friends go on a rollercoaster adventure and figure out why Stan Tall is in such a spin!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep51
programme.desc: Round and Round - Jeanie says going round in circles won't help find a missing key, but Monty isn't so sure.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep27
programme.desc: It's time to see the moon - JoJo wonders why the moon is a funny shape. Gran Gran explains why the moon appears to change shape in the night sky, and together they make a moon diary for JoJo to take home.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep26

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep35
programme.desc: Tummy Talk - When Sarah forgets her sandwich, her rumbling tummy inadvertently starts a conversation with a Frog.

programme.desc: Moon's Exhibition - A trip to the art gallery unexpectedly helps Duck with the hunt for his lost toy Rhino.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep5

programme.desc: Tina - Tired of being told what to do, Bluey and Bingo enlist their giant invisible friend Tina to show Mum and Dad who's boss. Now they can do anything they want, until Mum and Dad rebel.

programme.desc: Whale Watching - Bluey promises her customer, Bingo, the best tour ever in a game of Whale Watching, but they need Mum and Dad to join in, and they are too tired to play after a late night.

programme.desc: Moustache Mystery - Broccoli is horrified when someone paints moustaches on photographs of her friends!

programme.desc: Slowest road trip ever?! 87 km in a 120-year-old Car - Did you know women were driving cars before they had the right to vote? The London to Brighton Veteran Car Run isnt just the worlds oldest car rallyits a historic symbol of how women used motoring to challenge social norms and claim independence. From pre-1905 vintage cars to todays women drivers, this is the story of how the road became a place of freedom and equality.

programme.title: ENTR
programme.desc: Why Max (21) votes for the far-right AfD - A 21-year-old first-time voter from the countryside is facing his first federal election and chooses the far-right "Alternative fr Deutschland" (AfD), Germanys most controversial party. We follow him, question his reasons, and aim to understand why more and more young people are making this choice - until he then cancels the shoot.

programme.desc: After father's death, the son learns that father was put in a Japanese camp in the United States during the Pacific War. What happened to my father? A journey of the heart of son.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Let'S Trek Japan
programme.desc: Japan's heavy snow reveals stunning Snow Monsters. Join an exciting mountain adventure where fierce winds create ice formations. Discover the joys of Japan's winter mountains and meet locals.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Cycle Around Japan
programme.desc: On the islands and coast of the Yamaguchi end of the Seto Inland Sea, we experience a warm welcome in these hard-working small communities, poor in amenities but rich in happiness and human kindness.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Biz Stream
programme.desc: This upbeat program combines business and economic news with in-depth feature stories that give you a closer look at the latest trends within Japan and around the world.

programme.title: Texico
programme.desc: Learn the principles of programming without a computer. Animated characters provide fun and lucid explanations of 5 core processes: analysis, combination, generalization, abstraction, and simulation.

programme.title: Listen To The Earth
programme.desc: Leading experts teach us by means of demonstrations and quizzes how to listen to the Earth and prepare for earthquakes, typhoons, volcanoes and other life-threatening natural disasters.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: A shuttered elementary school reopened for just one family that moved back to their beloved hometown. We look at their joys and struggles, and local efforts to enliven a small fishing settlement.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #13 I want to see the snow. / To say what you want to do, replace the "masu" ending of a verb with "tai desu." For example, "mimasu" (to see) becomes "mitai desu" (to want to see).

programme.title: Treasure Box Japan: Toyama- Iwase
programme.desc: At the Iwase Hikiyama Festival held in May in the Iwase district, floats topped with ornate displays are pulled around town then made to collide into one another as an offering to the local deity.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: Toni and Evan are not only snowboarders but also expert surfers. They take cracks at boarding freely in the mountains as well as on the sea during the bitter frigid winter of Hokkaido.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo Mini
programme.desc: Bananas in Japan visit a plantation in one of the country's snowiest regions, and learn how sweetness is carefully developed in large Tokyo warehouses during the import process.

programme.title: The Seasons Of Yamato
programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: The Bird Cafe
programme.desc: We visit an Edo-style open-air teahouse, where the townspeople enjoyed refreshments, conversation, and the company of exotic birds. For them, these outings were about more than a good time.

programme.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from March 15, Day 7 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Osaka.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: Crafting Timeless Products

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: J-Melo

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: This program is an animation series about a Japanese dog, Charo. He meets and is helped by many mythical creatures of Northern Japan as he searches for eight star talismans. Tohoku series 1-10.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: In Japan, garbage is incinerated before being used for land reclamation, but space is running out. We explore new approaches to waste, such as biogas power generation and a litter-picking app.

programme.title: A Cat'S-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: One kitty waits near a fisherman for a treat while another helps radish farmers keep pests out of their fields. Get top-notch kitty customer service at a local pet fish shop!

programme.title: Anime Manga Explosion

programme.title: Let'S Enjoy Math
programme.desc: Numbler hides the measuring stick at a shoe shop so that a customer's foot cannot be measured. Barky realizes that the measurement can be made by counting how many 1-centimeter items are needed.

programme.title: Take Tech
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.desc: Prelims - After a historic 2024 campaign that saw him step into the Octagon three times in defense of his UFC light heavyweight title and emerge with three knockout victories, Brazilian superstar Alex Pereira begins the new year in Las Vegas with a UFC 313 main event clash against number one contender Magomed Ankalaev on March 9. A Russian powerhouse who is unbeaten for over six years, Ankalaev will now try to decipher the puzzle presented by Poatan, one of the most dominant champions in the world. Plus, high-level action is guaranteed when lightweights Justin Gaethje and Dan Hooker meet in a highly anticipated co-main event.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep708
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Fighter Focus: Diego Lopes, Unbreakable: Ignacio Bahamondes, Ultimate Access: Alexa Grasso, Origins: Paul Rosas" - Brazilian featherweight Diego Lopes shares his journey from Brazil to Mexico. Inspired by Mexico's fighting spirit, Diego has made his home in the heart of Puebla, where his team proudly calls themselves the Brazilian Warriors. Ignacio Bahamondes details the story of his unbreakable bond with his father, a South American kickboxing champion, who played a crucial role in guiding him to the pinnacle of MMA. We go behind the scenes with Alexa Grasso as she returns to Mexico City to commentate at Moreno vs Royval 2. As the UFC's youngest fighter, Raul Rosas reflects on the sacrifices his immigrant family made to provide him with the opportunity to compete at the sport's highest level.
